tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives

Class AbstractSrcDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractCSPDirective
      • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractSrcDirective
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractUnsafeDirective, BaseUriDirective, ChildSrcDirective, ConnectSrcDirective, DefaultSrcDirective, FontSrcDirective, FormActionDirective, FrameSrcDirective, ImgSrcDirective, MediaSrcDirective, ObjectSrcDirective

    public abstract class AbstractSrcDirective
extends AbstractCSPDirective
    The AbstractSrcDirective is a base class for all source-list based directives. It handles source-list validation.
    Author:
    Chris Smith
